definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: Pixilation results from the codec having to deal with the rapid flow of information.
sentences.chinese: 從編解碼器處理後的信息迅速流動模糊了的結果。

sentences.english: Vendor name on a printed receipt should be in a decodable format.
sentences.chinese: 收據上的商家名稱應該是可解碼的格式。

sentences.english: He added that rice and maize genomes that were decoded in the past were much smaller.
sentences.chinese: 他補充道，以往解碼的水稻與玉米基因組都要小的多。

sentences.english: Figure 6 shows the typical clamping of a video signal by a video decoder.
sentences.chinese: 圖6爲視頻解碼器箝位視頻信號的典型示意圖。

sentences.english: Chip DAC's have two current outputs.
sentences.chinese: 解碼芯片有兩路電流輸出。

sentences.english: By the subtitle decoder, the subtitles will be held in SDRAM in the receiver.
sentences.chinese: 經由字幕解碼器，字幕可以被存入片外SDRAM。

sentences.english: Your program operates on those decoded strings.
sentences.chinese: 程序對解碼後的字符串進行操作。

sentences.english: This paper presents a fixed-point MP3 decoding algorithm for embedded systems.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種用於嵌入式系統的MP3定點解碼算法。

sentences.english: However, when using the denoised signal with the codec, there is an additional benefit.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何編解碼器使用降噪信號都是有利的。

sentences.english: A. progrherewouls dona flow and decoding the output to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 解碼節目數據流，並輸入到電視機中。

sentences.english: Journey back into Beethoven's mind with the Borromeo String Quartet.
sentences.chinese: 博羅美奧絃樂四重奏將會爲我們進行貝多芬解碼。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new im age decoding algorithm to remove the "blocking artifact"appearing with block transform coding is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種消除變換編碼後解碼圖象塊效應的新方法。

sentences.english: When overridden in a derived class, decodes a sequence of bytes into a set of characters.
sentences.chinese: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將位元組序列解碼成一組字元。

sentences.english: The next step is to decode the message.
sentences.chinese: 下一步就是對信息進行解碼。

sentences.english: The tuner is for QAM demodulation and error-correcting decoding functions.
sentences.chinese: 其中，QAM解調和解碼功能由一體化高頻頭來實現。

sentences.english: A novel software-only video codec is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告了一種新的純軟件視頻編解碼算法。

definition: to break a code/to crack a riddle/to solve an enigma/a breakthrough
imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
